Name: AreaAtuacao
Title: Área de Atuacao
Descriptino: Área de atuação médica (Resolução CFM n. 2.330/2023)

Name: BRMunicipio
Title: Município
Descriptino: Municípios brasileiros, entes subnacionais.

Name: BRTipoDocumentoIndividuo
Title: Tipo de Documento do Indivíduo
Descriptino: Classifica o tipo de documento que está sendo utilizado para identificar o indivíduo.

Name: EHRDocumentType
Title: EHRDocumentType
Descriptino: Tipos de documentos OpenEHR (TDDs)

Name: Especialidade
Title: Especialidade
Descriptino: Especialidade médica (Resolução CFM n. 2.330/2023)

Name: EventSummaryType
Title: EventSummaryType
Descriptino: Tipos de estruturas usadas para construir um registro eletrônico de saúde do tipo "sumário de evento ou contato assistencial"

Name: NivelFederacao
Title: Nível da Federacao
Descriptino: Tipo de federação suportada para um PractitionerRole

Name: ServiceRequestCategory
Title: ServiceRequestCategory
Descriptino: Categorias utilizadas nos perfis do recurso ServiceRequest

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SNOMEDCTFormCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Form Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all dose form codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

Name: medicationRequest Course of Therapy Codes
Title: Medication request  course of  therapy  codes
Descriptino: MedicationRequest Course of Therapy Codes

Name: medicationRequest Status Reason Codes
Title: Medication request  status  reason  codes
Descriptino: MedicationRequest Status Reason Codes

Name: FHIRSpecimenCollectionMethod
Title: FHIR Specimen Collection Method
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the method by which a specimen was collected.

Name: Hl7VSSpecimenType
Title: hl7VS-specimenType
Descriptino: Concepts that describe the precise nature of an entity that may be used as the source material for an observation.  This is one of two code systems that are used instead of table 0070 (code system xxxx) which conflated specimen types and specimen collection methods.   Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSSpecimenCondition
Title: hl7VS-specimenCondition
Descriptino: Concepts of modes or states of being that describe the nature of a specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSRelevantClincialInformation
Title: hl7VS-relevantClincialInformation
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.

Name: Hl7VSVSObservationType
Title: hl7VS-VS-observationType
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify types of observations to enable systems to distinguish between observations sent along with an order, versus observations sent as the result to an order.

Name: ActSubstanceAdminSubstitutionCode
Title: ActSubstanceAdminSubstitutionCode
Descriptino: ***No description***

Name: SubstanceAdminSubstitutionReason
Title: SubstanceAdminSubstitutionReason
Descriptino: ***No description***
